verses.verse: And Moses<WH4872> with the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> commanded<WH6680> <WH853> the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> Keep<WH8104> <WH853> all<WH3605> the commandments<WH4687> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> you this day.<WH3117>

And it shall be<WH1961> on the day<WH3117> when<WH834> ye shall pass over<WH5674> <WH853> Jordan<WH3383> unto<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee, that thou shalt set thee up<WH6965> great<WH1419> stones,<WH68> and plaster<WH7874> them with plaster: <WH7875>

And thou shalt write<WH3789> upon<WH5921> them<WH853> all<WH3605> the words<WH1697> of this<WH2063> law,<WH8451> when thou art passed over,<WH5674> that<WH4616> <WH834> thou mayest go in<WH935> unto<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee, a land<WH776> that floweth<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey;<WH1706> as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of thy fathers<WH1> hath promised<WH1696> thee.

Therefore it shall be<WH1961> when ye be gone over<WH5674> <WH853> Jordan,<WH3383> that ye shall set up<WH6965> <WH853> these<WH428> stones,<WH68> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> you this day,<WH3117> in mount<WH2022> Ebal,<WH5858> and thou shalt plaster<WH7874> them with plaster.<WH7875>

And there<WH8033> shalt thou build<WH1129> an altar<WH4196> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> an altar<WH4196> of stones:<WH68> thou shalt not<WH3808> lift up<WH5130> any iron<WH1270> tool upon<WH5921> them.

Thou shalt build<WH1129> <WH853> the altar<WH4196> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> of whole<WH8003> stones:<WH68> and thou shalt offer<WH5927> burnt offerings<WH5930> thereon<WH5921> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God: <WH430>
And thou shalt offer<WH2076> peace offerings,<WH8002> and shalt eat<WH398> there,<WH8033> and rejoice<WH8055> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God.<WH430>
And thou shalt write<WH3789> upon<WH5921> the stones<WH68> <WH853> all<WH3605> the words<WH1697> of this<WH2063> law<WH8451> very plainly.<WH874> <WH3190>

And Moses<WH4872> and the priests<WH3548> the Levites<WH3881> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> all<WH3605> Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> Take heed,<WH5535> and hearken,<WH8085> O Israel;<WH3478> this<WH2088> day<WH3117> thou art become<WH1961> the people<WH5971> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God.<WH430>

Thou shalt therefore obey<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> and do<WH6213> <WH853> his commandments<WH4687> and his statutes,<WH2706> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> thee this day.<WH3117>
And Moses<WH4872> charged<WH6680> <WH853> the people<WH5971> the same<WH1931> day,<WH3117> saying,<WH559>

These <WH428> shall stand<WH5975> upon<WH5921> mount<WH2022> Gerizim<WH1630> to bless<WH1288> <WH853> the people,<WH5971> when ye are come over<WH5674> <WH853> Jordan;<WH3383> Simeon,<WH8095> and Levi,<WH3878> and Judah,<WH3063> and Issachar,<WH3485> and Joseph,<WH3130> and Benjamin: <WH1144>
And these<WH428> shall stand<WH5975> upon mount<WH2022> Ebal<WH5858> to<WH5921> curse;<WH7045> Reuben,<WH7205> Gad,<WH1410> and Asher,<WH836> and Zebulun,<WH2074> Dan,<WH1835> and Naphtali.<WH5321>
And the Levites<WH3881> shall speak,<WH6030> and say<WH559> unto<WH413> all<WH3605> the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> with a loud<WH7311> voice,<WH6963>

Cursed <WH779> be the man<WH376> that<WH834> maketh<WH6213> any graven<WH6459> or molten image,<WH4541> an abomination<WH8441> unto the LORD,<WH3068> the work<WH4639> of the hands<WH3027> of the craftsman,<WH2796> and putteth<WH7760> it in a secret<WH5643> place. And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> shall answer<WH6030> and say,<WH559> Amen.<WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that setteth light<WH7034> by his father<WH1> or his mother.<WH517> And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> Amen.<WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that removeth<WH5253> his neighbor's<WH7453> landmark.<WH1366> And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> Amen.<WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that maketh the blind<WH5787> to wander<WH7686> out of the way.<WH1870> And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> Amen.<WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that perverteth<WH5186> the judgment<WH4941> of the stranger,<WH1616> fatherless,<WH3490> and widow.<WH490> And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> Amen.<WH543>

Cursed <WH779> be he that lieth<WH7901> with<WH5973> his father's<WH1> wife;<WH802> because<WH3588> he uncovereth<WH1540> his father's<WH1> skirt.<WH3671> And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> Amen.<WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that lieth<WH7901> with<WH5973> any manner<WH3605> of beast.<WH929> And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> Amen.<WH543>

Cursed <WH779> be he that lieth<WH7901> with<WH5973> his sister,<WH269> the daughter<WH1323> of his father,<WH1> or<WH176> the daughter<WH1323> of his mother.<WH517> And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> Amen.<WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that lieth<WH7901> with<WH5973> his mother-in-law.<WH2859> And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> Amen.<WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that smiteth<WH5221> his neighbor<WH7453> secretly.<WH5643> And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> Amen.<WH543>
Cursed <WH779> be he that taketh<WH3947> reward<WH7810> to slay<WH5221> an innocent<WH5355> person.<WH5315> And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> Amen.<WH543>

Cursed <WH779> be he that<WH834> confirmeth<WH6965> not<WH3808> all<WH853> the words<WH1697> of this<WH2063> law<WH8451> to do<WH6213> them. And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> Amen.<WH543>
